snippet: The Census Bureau introduced its first mobile app to give economists, policy makers and citizens greater access to real-time data on the health of the nation’s economy.
lead_paragraph: The Census Bureau introduced its first mobile app to give economists, policy makers and citizens greater access to real-time data on the health of the nation’s economy.

headline.seo: A Mobile App for Analysts and Students of the Economy
headline.main: A Mobile App for Analysts and Students of the Economy
headline.print_headline: A Mobile App for Analysts and Students of the Economy
